meanings.definition: Having the highest degree of red color.
meanings.sent1: The apple was the reddest in the bunch.
meanings.sent2: Her cheeks turned reddest when she was embarrassed.
meanings.sent3: The reddest crayon in the box was always the first to be used.
meanings.sent4: The reddest sunset painted the sky in brilliant hues.
meanings.sent5: The reddest rose in the garden stood out among the rest.

meanings.sent1: She reddest the fabric by washing it with hot water.
meanings.sent2: The sun's rays reddest the skin after a long day at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally reddest the sauce, turning it a deep crimson.
meanings.sent4: The artist carefully reddest the canvas with bold strokes of paint.
meanings.sent5: The dye will reddest the fabric to a vibrant shade of crimson.
